feeling exactly like how i used to feel when i read munshi premchand and co. as a kid from my hindi textbook before the term aktually started and shit sometimes caught me existential as 12 yo ngl

yeah the english literature also hit sure but the hindi literature described things that i had either experienced sometimes or can see it happening in some village near me. or got me feeling nostalgia of things i never experienced. the thing is i dont remember most of those stories but i remember exactly how i felt reading those and it was like this. even the after taste.
weird tho cause i haevnt felt like this in atleast 6 years

listening to kanye and tyler the creator while thikning about life and studying up simd architecture adn how to optimise operations feels pretty good to understand something deeply and not worry about what came before or after. oh read freiren's manga too, so everything im feeling is teh culmination of that.

Doing things while being absorbed nowadays i also remember feeling like this while i went to a school named oxford from my school and their auditorium was pretty good and they served some snacks too, i went there for some competition it was pretty nice.
Anyways as to what im doing nowadays im optimising this anthropics assignment to surpass the limit of opus as well as myself
This is the link if anyone else wants to try [https://github.com/anthropics/original_performance_takehome](https://github.com/anthropics/original_performance_takehome)
im also learning kernel optimizations too while doing adn it has been a good experience so far but i wanna finish it on a good note. Lemme see what i can do.
Also writing an article on my learning will publish it :D

Hmm so now i coded up a fraud_detection system in go :D
The struct i used is one thing ive noticed is in system design oas if you figure out the initial struct then the rest becomes kinda doable. So the struct for this was
type merchant struct {
id                string
fraudTransactions map[string]int
totalTransactions map[string]int
isFraud           bool
And then a map of merchants[id] = *merchant :D

One step at a time pls you might not get where you want to at once. But slowly and surely just keep picking the next best thing adn you’ll make it. And remember be kind to yourself and take care of yourself none of it really matters if you arent loving and

Anyways i was studying and something obv to anyone studying cs would be that when we delete smth it doesnt aktually get deleted even after clearing bin cause the bits until occupied by smth else are still there for this tools do exist
Like shred on linux

But nothing on mac cause i mean i asked claude adn apparently there existed one but now there is no need as teh data is encrypted and once key is deleted no way to access that data not only that you could enable altho it should already be System Settings → Privacy & Security → FileVault
Also you cant aktually build this cause macs all use SSDs with wear leveling, so overwriting doesn't guarantee the data is actually erased from the physical flash cells
Oh also ts is the reason that your shred command is good in theory but wont work aktuallly in practice so yeah have fun :D

Hey who wants to train models ;D   hmmmm 🤔
Anyways if you wanna start the first thing to know are these
1. FORWARD PASS │ │ Input → Model → Prediction
2. COMPUTE LOSS │ │ How wrong is the prediction?
3. BACKWARD PASS (Backpropagation) │ │ Compute gradients: ∂Loss/∂weights
4. UPDATE WEIGHTS │ │ weights -= learning_rate × gradient
5. REPEAT (thousands of times)
each run tthrough all of data is called an epoch

hi, added a few more features to canvas like exporting stl and multiturn.
so I have smth in mind let's say how do I losslessly iterate on that canvas and have control over complex models.
let's say if i give it a batman logo it should be able to create a model of it. It should be able to break it into several parts so that model of that could be created.
So we can see several models clubbed together to make that and then yk we will 3d print them one by one and then join them.

Hmm but how will it break it into parts that software needs to be created. Look at it like this first we need some intermediary of our sketch smth not as bad as sketch but not as fixed as the final code. Smth in between which we will break into several parts iykwim. So we will go through that intermediary and as soon as it gets complex break it away. Smth like that.
